ygData.subject: Re: How can I tell when my skill has maxed for that  leve?
ygData.msgSnippet: Normally your skills go up in increments of 5 per level.  The max skill at level 17 is 90 (for magic stuff).  Also you can check with your trainer and try to
ygData.messageBody:
Normally your skills go up in increments of 5 per level. The max skill at
level 17 is 90 (for magic stuff). Also you can check with your trainer and
try to train the skill (which could be pricey and loose a trng point if you
are wrong). Also you can try the formula, which is correct from previous
messasge.

-----Original Message-----
From: Elkantar The Merchant of Occlo [mailto:the_elkantar@...]
Sent: Saturday, May 01, 1999 1:59 PM
To: eq_wizards@onelist.com
Subject: [eq_wizards] How can I tell when my skill has maxed for that
leve?


From: "Elkantar The Merchant of Occlo" <the_elkantar@...>
